activities: www.Monitorforhire.com is a web-enabled management tool for locating and contracting available, independent clinical monitors for the Pharmaceutical, Biotech, Medical Device companies and Contract Research Organizations. Clinical monitors perform reviews of clinical investigative sites, data collection and adherence to Good Clinical Practice as mandated by the FDA. We provide unparalleled access (24/7) and cost efficiency (less expensive) for our clients to obtain clinical monitors. A Monitors "Personal Information" means information that personally identifies the monitor, including name, address, email address, phone number, work experience, references and skills. Sponsors "Personal Information" means information that personally identifies a clinical trial sponsor, including for example, the company name, contact name, contact title, address, email address, phone number, a description of the project submitted including skills desired and invoicing information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
